string.name: application_exception_application_fault_description
string.value: Build an exception event, and the event is triggered 3s later. Start the app and open the current page. About 1 minute later, the last abnormal exit information is displayed.

string.name: application_exception_crash_event_message
string.value: The crash event is triggered 3s later. Start the app and open the current page to obtain the last abnormal exit information.

string.name: application_exception_freeze_event_message
string.value: The suspension event is triggered 3s later. Start the app and open the current page to obtain the last abnormal exit information.

string.name: application_exception_data_delay_toast
string.value: The data is updated in about 1-3 minutes.
